alert.note: Alert for Bayfield; Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN BAYFIELD AND NORTHEASTERN DOUGLAS COUNTIES THROUGH 600 PM CDT... At 529 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Port Wing, to 8 miles north of Poplar, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Port Wing around 545 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Oulu, Herbster and Cornucopia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
